word: H2865 - חָתַת - châthath - khaw-thath' - Abolish - ஒழித்துவிடு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - கலங்கு வெடித்திரு. முறிந்துபோ, நொறுங்கு, முறியடிக்கப்படு, இறங்கு, அற்றுப்போ, பயந்திரு, அஞ்சு
to be shattered, to be dismayed, to be broken, to be abolished, to be afraid
1) to be shattered, to be broken
b) (Niphal) to be broken, to be dismayed
c) (Piel) to be shattered, to be dismayed, to be scared

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to prostrate; hence to break down, either (literally) by violence, or (figuratively) by confusion and fear: - abolish, affright, be (make) afraid, amaze, beat down, discourage, (cause to) dismay, go down, scare, terrify.
Cognate: H2844, H2847, H2849, H2851, H2865, H2866, H2867, H4288
